javadoc: A plugin-level about handler that serves as the callback from the Dock's 'About' popup action.

methods.javadoc:
Applies an about handler which will show our custom about dialog.
@param winMgr The docking window manager to use to install the about dialog.
methods.name: install
methods.comment: Applies an about handler which will show our custom about dialog.

params.name: winMgr
params.comment: The docking window manager to use to install the about dialog.
